content: Get mad, then get over it. — Colin Powell

content: The chief enemy of creativity is good sense. — Pablo Picasso

content: Every moment of happiness requires a great amount of Ignorance — Honore de Balzac

content: Nothing you do is going to matter that much in the long run. Don't take yourself so seriously. — Naval Ravikant

content: The only way round is through. — Robert Frost

content: Rather than love, than money, than fame, give me truth. — Henry David Thoreau

content: Go for it now. The future is promised to no one.  — Wayne Dyer

content: Do not try to be on the side of the majority, but live according to your inner laws. — Marcus Aurelius

content: Listening well is as powerful as talking well, and is also as essential to true conversation. — Chinese Proverb

content: Learning is a gift, even when pain is your teacher. — Michael Jordan

content: As long as a human being worries about when he will die, and what he has that is his, all of his works are zero. — Kabir

content: A hopeless man is a very desperate and dangerous man, almost a dead man. — Robert F. Kennedy

content: Successful people do what unsuccessful people are not willing to do. — Jim Rohn

content: The world makes way for the man who knows where he is going. — Ralph Waldo Emerson

content: One must be poor to know the luxury of giving. — George Eliot
